channel.title: Comments on: Phone Frozen
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: David
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: try taking out the battery then putting it back in. You may also want to do a master reset (doing so will not clear out your phone book and any data you have) Go into settings scroll down to master reset your security code should be the last four of your phone,scroll to yes for master reset,the phone should then power cycle and it should work ok.
item.content:encoded: try taking out the battery then putting it back in. You may also want to do a master reset (doing so will not clear out your phone book and any data you have) Go into settings scroll down to master reset your security code should be the last four of your phone,scroll to yes for master reset,the phone should then power cycle and it should work ok.
